articles.title: In another reversal, CDC removes airborne transmission guidance - ETHealthworld.com
articles.description: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention introduced — and then on Monday quietly withdrew — guidance on its website acknowledging that coronavirus is transmitted mainly through the air.
